My Gali Bracelet
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2003 Topics (Year of the Counter): My Gali Bracelet
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, December 30, 2003 - 05:01 pm:

I have been collecting italian sun charms with faces on them to make a Gali bracelet, and I finally got enough to fill it out and thought I'd show everyone. True, they aren't made by Tecmo, but I had fun assembling them off ebay for the past 6 months!

The Bracelet

(ignore the rainbows, they are an artifact of my scanner)
All but one of the silver colored ones is sterling, a couple of the gold ones are 18K, the rest are costume jewelry.

By Digital Jasmine on Wednesday, December 31, 2003 - 02:44 am:

By Icelord13 on Wednesday, December 31, 2003 - 09:48 am:

Its' very cool. I like it. =)

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, December 31, 2003 - 10:35 am:

The scan was theoretically at 100%, but converting the image does odd things -so now, on my monitor, it's more than double actual size. The links are 3/8 of an inch high, and my total length is 7¼".

For those not familiar with italian charms, the links hook onto each other to make a circle, I just opened mine up for the picture. The bracelets expand sort of like a stretchy watch bands to take on and off.
